name: Mockapitron
tagline: Tool for generating random api response based on schema
body: ### Mockapitron Tool for generating random api response based on [](https://github.com/adleroliveira/dreamjs) and [](http://chancejs.com/) ## What do you need to get started ? Send **POST** request to [http://api-mockapitron.rhcloud.com/](http://api-mockapitron.rhcloud.com/) with **schema** and **size** parameters > Default values for parameters { schema:{}, size:0 } Usage example: ```javascript fetch('http://api-mockapitron.rhcloud.com/', { method: 'post', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, mode: "cors", body: JSON.stringify({ schema: { name: 'name', adress: 'address' }, size: 3 }) }) .then(function(res){ return res.json() }) .then(function(data){ console.log(data) }) ``` ## Standard schema property types: * String * Number * Date * Boolean * Array ## Few custom schema property types: * Name * Age * Address * Gender * (RGB) color Full list of available schema property types are available [here](http://chancejs.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
